main_topic.author: JK-Piece
main_topic.title: Some competitors still have 3 agents active.
main_topic.content: While most participants that are actively submitting have 2 agents active, older submissions still have 3 agents active (at least this is displayed on the leaderboard). Is this a bug?

comments.author: Songling
comments.content: It should be updated after the game. Now we have six agents

comments.author: blackbun
comments.content: I guess the number of active agents changes once you submit a new agent after the rule update.
